title: Into the Clouds We Gaze (2014)
overview: A gentle love story from the harsh environment of northern Bohemia.
storyline: Supple bodies undulating to the rhythms of electronic music, glaring neon lights on the undercarriage, and the roar of engines that won't let you sleep. Alcohol, drugs, erotica, sex. Morning is approaching and another tuning event is over.... This nontraditional portrait explores ordinary days in the spent life of one Czech man whose car became his best friend.
